summary: The diff implements a comprehensive meme coin website with all major sections, visual theme, and coin image integration. All 10 requirements appear to be substantially implemented. The hero coin uses a float/bob animation (animate-coin-float) which satisfies the AC allowing 'spin or float'. The coin image path in components uses '/assets/generated/pointless-coin.dim_512x512.png' matching the requirement. A TickerBanner component was added which was not requested. The main.tsx wraps the app in InternetIdentityProvider which relates to auth — a stated non-goal — but appears to be framework scaffold boilerplate.

hallucinated_features.description: TickerBanner component — a horizontally scrolling marquee banner with meme-coin slogans placed between the hero and about sections
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement or acceptance criterion requested a ticker/marquee banner component. This is an extra UI element not specified in the build request.

hallucinated_features.description: InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity/useActor hooks integrated into main.tsx and included in the project
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states 'No user authentication' and 'No wallet connection' as non-goals, yet Internet Identity authentication infrastructure is included in the project.
